subtitle.Text: Oh man, mom handwriting. We went through a lot of different moms for handwriting! A lot of different moms contributed handwriting for our game.

At first - let’s see, how did we do that - what were we doing first? I think I just did it and it wasn’t great, and then we had Emily do it, but her handwriting was used so heavily in other parts of the game
that we had to find someone else and I think we actually had Johnnemann try to do it for awhile before he was dad’s handwriting.
And then we got Johnnemann’s mom and she was ideal for it, really good mom handwriting… yeah!
